navigation placeholders
Sunshine and Shorts:
Leave the Snow up North
Family-Owned and Operated RV Resort | Zolfo Springs
The Perfect Getaway Place
Welcome to Cracker Lake RV Resort! We are a getaway designed for recreational vehicles. We have all the necessary amenities: electrical and water hookups, laundry, showers, and restrooms. We also have a rec room, beautiful scenery, a nature community, and lots to do nearby.
Contact us today to learn more!
Contact Us
Our Services
Enhancing Your RV Experience
You'll find that we have provided everything needed to make your stay at Cracker Lake exceptional. From charming nature and scenery to rec room activities and a wonderful community, there is something for everyone. Contact us now to book your stay.
Contact Us
Local Attractions
We are located in Zolfo Springs, Florida. There are tons of nearby things to do. Places to eat, shop, and explore.
Learn more
Rec Room
We have a wonderful community rec room located at our RV resort. We also offer a range of facilities, including picnic areas, fire pits, and more!
Learn more
Outdoor Activities
From hiking and camping to fishing and boating, there's no shortage of things to do. Cracker Lake offers ample opportunities for hiking, biking, and wildlife watching.
Learn more
Accommodations for A
Comfortable Stay
Whether you are coming in your RV or staying in one of ours, we have accommodations for everyone. Our resort offers vacation rentals as well as hookup options. We strive to provide a comfortable place for all guests to stay with ease.
Contact us now to discuss all our options.
Contact Us
Discover Seasonal Paradise
If you are looking for the perfect winter escape, you've come to the right place. Florida is a wonderful place to visit, and Cracker Lake can only make your stay better. Not only does our resort offer lots to do and experience, but you'll find lots more to do in the surrounding area. Book now for a memorable stay.
Get In Touch
Book with us today
Cracker Lake RV Resort is all about providing a relaxing stay. Part of this is making it easy to book and stay with us. We have a straightforward booking process. We also ensure that there are multiple options at our resort to choose from when deciding where to stay. From different types of RVs, tents, and pop-up campers to large motorhomes and fifth wheels, we can accommodate it all. We also offer rental options for those who don't own an RV but still want to enjoy the experience.
Contact us today to start the booking process.
Rental Request
A Place for the whole family
Cracker Lake provides a family-friendly place to vacation. We offer a variety of amenities and activities for all ages. Our RV resort is perfect in terms of location, size, and proximity to popular attractions. Vacationers of all ages will have a blast staying here. So it doesn't matter if your family likes a relaxing escape or an outdoor adventure; you'll be sure to find it here.
Contact us now to book your stay.
Book Now
cOMMUNITY activities for every season
Nestled within the serene backdrop of our RV park and resort lies a heartwarming community space where laughter and camaraderie bloom all year round. Our rec room is the beating heart of social gatherings, offering a plethora of activities that cater to every age and interest. We offer community dining, live music, games, and more!
Book Today

Frequently Asked Questions
Please don't hesitate to call or contact us with any questions you may have!
FAQ Schema json-ld
End of FAQ Schema json -ld
Why is Cracker Lake RV Resort so popular?
Cracker Lake
RV
Resort is so popular for countless reasons. Our renters love our
RV park
because of its location, amenities, activities, scenery, community, and much more.
If you are looking for a winter getaway, there is no better place than our
RV park
. We have an easy booking process and great rates. Our
RV park
also has unlimited options for vacation fun. Whether you are looking to relax or experience an outdoor adventure, you'll find it here.
Contact us today to reserve your spot at our
RV park
.
Does Cracker Lake RV Resort accept reservations?
Yes, booking ahead or making a reservation is encouraged to ensure you'll have a spot that fits your specific needs. You can make a reservation by filling out the Contact Form on our website.
How do I contact Cracker Lake RV Resort?
There are many ways you can reach out to Cracker Lake RV Resort. You can call us at
863-735-1331
, email us at
rozarentals@gmail.com
, or fill out the
Contact Form
on our website.
RV Park
Rental Request
Contact Us
Call Us:
863-735-1331
E
mail Us:
rozarentals@gmail.com
Visit Us:
296 FL-64, Zolfo Springs, FL 33890
© 2025
All Rights Reserved | Cracker Lake RV Resort

========= JS Section =========
Load jQuery
End Load jQuery
Injecting site-wide before scripts
End Injecting site-wide to the head
HEAD RT JS Include
End of HEAD RT JS Include
photoswipe markup
Root element of PhotoSwipe. Must have class pswp.
Background of PhotoSwipe. 
         It's a separate element as animating opacity is faster than rgba().
Slides wrapper with overflow:hidden.
Container that holds slides. 
            PhotoSwipe keeps only 3 of them in the DOM to save memory.
            Don't modify these 3 pswp__item elements, data is added later on.
Default (PhotoSwipeUI_Default) interface on top of sliding area. Can be changed.
Controls are self-explanatory. Order can be changed.
Preloader demo http://codepen.io/dimsemenov/pen/yyBWoR
element will get class pswp__preloader--active when preloader is running
Alias: 7e1aba3b
Share by:
End Script tags
